title: rclone stopped working with Jottacloud legacy login
body:
#### The associated forum post URL from `https://forum.rclone.org`
https://forum.rclone.org/t/elkjop-cloud-config/52526


#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?


I have chosen jottacloud and it fails here

```
Option config_type.
Select authentication type.
Choose a number from below, or type in an existing value of type string.
Press Enter for the default (standard).
/ Standard authentication.
1 | Use this if you're a normal Jottacloud user.
\ (standard)
/ Legacy authentication.
2 | This is only required for certain whitelabel versions of Jottacloud and not recommended for normal users.
\ (legacy)
/ Telia Cloud authentication.
3 | Use this if you are using Telia Cloud (Sweden).
\ (telia_se)
/ Telia Sky authentication.
4 | Use this if you are using Telia Sky (Norway).
\ (telia_no)
/ Tele2 Cloud authentication.
5 | Use this if you are using Tele2 Cloud.
\ (tele2)
/ Onlime Cloud authentication.
6 | Use this if you are using Onlime Cloud.
\ (onlime)
config_type> 2

Do you want to create a machine specific API key?

Rclone has it's own Jottacloud API KEY which works fine as long as one
only uses rclone on a single machine. When you want to use rclone with
this account on more than one machine it's recommended to create a
machine specific API key. These keys can NOT be shared between
machines.
y) Yes
n) No (default)
y/n> y

Error: failed to register device: Post "https://api.jottacloud.com/auth/v1/register?device_id=rclone-44vt04llECptGXr3FwurU": read tcp 192.168.1.195:52037->185.179.129.36:443: wsarecv: En eksisterende forbindelse blev tvangsafbrudt af en ekstern vært.
```

If i choose no instead of yes I get:

```
Option config_password.
Password (only used in setup, will not be stored)
Choose an alternative below. Press Enter for the default (n).
y) Yes, type in my own password
g) Generate random password
n) No, leave this optional password blank (default)
y/g/n> y
Enter the password:
password:
Confirm the password:
password:

2025/09/15 17:12:53 CRITICAL: Reveal failed: input too short when revealing password - is it obscured?
```

#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

Elkjøp cloud


#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)
rclone v1.71.0


#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)
Linux and Linux Docker (binhex-rclone)


#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)
Jottacloud White Label Products like Elkjøp cloud, LetsGoCloud, etc. with lagacy login


#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
rclone config


#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
see above
